  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_294</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_294</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">El juego de vida</string>
            <string language="en">The game of life</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Spiel des Lebens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le jeu de la vie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O jogo da vida</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il gioco di vita</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το παιχνίδι της ζωής</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">"unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones el 'juego de la vida' de Conway. Se estudian diferentes configuraciones: tetrominós, pentominós; y se comentan algunas implicaciones y consideraciones acerca de la Inteligencia Artificial."</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to explain Conway's game of life and studies different configurations (tetrominos and pentominos) and comments some of the implications and discussions about artificial intelligence.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">inteligencia artificial</string>
            <string language="en">artificial intelligence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Conway</string>
            <string language="en">Conway</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">tetrominós</string>
            <string language="en">tetromino</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">pentominós</string>
            <string language="en">pentomino</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">juego de la vida</string>
            <string language="en">game of life</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, Spiel Conways der unterschiedlichen Konfigurationen des 
Lebens und der Studien (tetrominos und pentominos) und Kommentar zu 
erklären einige der Implikationen und der Diskussionen über 
künstliche Intelligenz.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'expliquer le jeu de Conway de différentes 
configurations de la vie et d'études (tetrominos et pentominos) et 
les commentaires certaines des implications et des discussions au 
sujet de l'intelligence artificielle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações explicar 
o jogo de Conway de configurações diferentes da vida e dos estudos 
(tetrominos e pentominos) e os comentários algumas das implicações 
e das discussões sobre a inteligência artificial.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
spiegare il gioco del Conway delle configurazioni differenti di studi 
e di vita (tetrominos e pentominos) e le osservazioni alcune delle 
implicazioni e delle discussioni circa intelligenza artificiale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να εξηγήσει το παιχνίδι Conway των διαφορετικών 
διαμορφώσεων ζωής και μελετών (tetrominos και pentominos) και
τα σχόλια μερικές από τις επιπτώσεις και τις συζητήσεις για την 
τεχνητή νοημοσύνη.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">künstliche Intelligenz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Conway</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">tetromino</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">pentomino</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiel des Lebens</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">intelligence artificielle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Conway</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>
